_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: SimpleCloud
author: support@NeverStopGaming.net
description:
Version: 2.2
the SimpleCloud-Pterodactyl-egg is an egg which runs the SimpleCloud software inside of Pterodactyl

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
apt update
apt install -y curl unzip

mkdir -p /mnt/server
export HOME=/mnt/server
cd /mnt/server

curl -o /mnt/server/SimpleCloud-Latest.zip -Li https://github.com/theSimpleCloud/SimpleCloud/releases/download/v2.8.1/SimpleCloud-v2.8.1.zip?raw=true
curl -o /mnt/server/SimpleCloud.zip -Li https://github.com/NeverStopGaming/SimpleCloud-Pterodactyl-egg/blob/main/download/SimpleCloud.zip?raw=true

unzip SimpleCloud-Latest.zip
unzip SimpleCloud.zip

chmod 777 runner.jar
chmod 777 launcher.jar
chmod 777 storage/base.jar

rm -r SimpleCloud.zip
rm -r SimpleCloud-Latest.zip

echo Finish!
